abstract: “I think it would be inappropriate for me, an unelected official from a different branch of government, to change that result so that the motion would succeed,” he said.
lead_paragraph: Senator Chuck Schumer of New York, the Democratic leader, on Friday evening asked a pointed question of Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr.: Was he aware that the chief justice during President Andrew Johnson’s impeachment trial acted as the tie-breaker on two separate votes?
